snippet.title: CONCRETE VISIONS | Teaser
snippet.description:
Wishlist | Purchase | Follow Here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2787460/CONCRETE_VISIONS/

Developer DOSMan Games & VoxPop Games present:

Concrete Visions is a first-person lo-fi art house psychological thriller video game with survival horror and FPS beat’em up elements. There are two main components to the gameplay - melee & lite arms combat and environmental exploration

Heavily influenced by games such as Condemned: Criminal Origins,  Fahrenheit: Indigo Prophecy & Anatomy 

The game's combat is built primarily around melee; firearms are available, but are relatively uncommon.

The "goal with Concrete Visions  is to combine a disturbing photo sourced atmosphere with nightmarish aesthetics to have an replayable gameplay experience for horror and FPS fans

Check out more about CONCRETE VISIONS here: https://voxpopgames.itch.io/concrete-visions

Follow DOSMan Games here: https://twitter.com/DOSManGames
Follow VoxPop Games here: https://linktr.ee/voxpopgames

#indiegame #indiegames
